# systemProtectionManager

**Instance Property**

The system protection manager associated with this scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var systemProtectionManager: UIScene.SystemProtectionManager? { get }
```

## Discussion

To check whether the scene requires user authentication, inspect the manager’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScene/SystemProtectionManager-swift.class/isUserAuthenticationEnabled] property.

## Working with system protection manager

- **UIScene.SystemProtectionManager**: A class that represents the status of system protection for the scene.
- **systemProtectionDidChangeNotification**: A notification posted when the system-protection attributes of a scene change.
